label: 若年寄
本: Edo and Paris:  Urban Life and the State in the Early Modern Era . Cornell University Press . 1994
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: The (usually) three to five officials appointed from 1633 (except for the period from 1649 to 1662) to constitute the second most important board in the shogun's bureaucracy; supervised lesser officials such as the metsuke. [目付]
